ACv.caption: Text value
ACv.doc: The text that will be inside the file.
ACv.name: text_value

ACw.caption: File name without extension
ACw.doc: If the file will be "my_file.txt", then here you'll input "my_file". Always without quotes.
ACw.name: file_name_without_extension

ACz.caption: File extension
ACz.doc: If the file will be "my_file.txt", then here you'll input "txt". Always without quotes.
ACz.name: file_extension
